description: The survey CSV field separator. Should be a single character or special character like '\t'. If omitted, default is ','.
Path to a Java properties file containing survey metadata, relative from the current working directory. If omitted, default is '~/surveyman/params.properties'.
Produces verbose output. If omitted, default is no verbose output.
The name of the output file. Default is 'results.csv'
The exterior programming calling the main method on this class
The method for classifying respondents as bots
The total number of respondents you want to model for the simulation
The step size when increasing the percentage of bad actors in the simulation
A file name to dump the output of this run to.
